Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Field potential duration ( FPD ) in human - induced pluripotent stem cell - derived cardiomyocytes ( hiPS - CMs ) , which can express QT interval in an electrocardiogram , is reported to be a useful tool to predict K ( + ) channel and Ca ( 2 + ) channel blocker effects on QT interval .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| QT interval |

Explanation:

In the given paragraph, the term "QT interval" is the only disease entity mentioned. It is a measure of the time between the start of the Q wave and the end of the T wave in the heart's electrical cycle, which is depicted on an electrocardiogram (ECG). The prolongation of the QT interval can lead to a potentially fatal arrhythmia called torsades de pointes.

It is a measure of the time between the start of the Q wave and the end of the T wave in the heart's electrical cycle, which is depicted on an electrocardiogram (ECG). The prolongation of the QT interval can lead to a potentially fatal arrhythmia called torsades de pointes.

Paragraph: Field potential duration ( FPD ) in human - induced pluripotent stem cell - derived cardiomyocytes ( hiPS - CMs ) , which can express QT interval in an electrocardiogram , is reported to be a useful tool to predict K ( + ) channel and Ca ( 2 + ) channel blocker effects on QT interval .

In this paragraph, the two chemical entities mentioned are "K ( + )" and "Ca ( 2 + )". These are the chemical symbols for Potassium ion and Calcium ion, respectively.
